jumpyjay.gamestates

Class LevelMenu

  • java.lang.Object
    • jumpyjay.gamestates.GameState
      • jumpyjay.gamestates.LevelMenu

  • public class LevelMenu
extends GameState
    The Class LevelMenu. The menu between the first menu and each level. This menu displays all levels for the user to choose which level he wants to go to. The levels that are blocked are shown as a locker.

    • Method Detail

      • init

        public void init()
        Init initiates the game state. Loads the game. Initializes the camera, Sprite Batch and buttons. Initializes also the robot sprite in the bottom of the screen.
        Specified by:
        init in class GameState

      • update

        public void update(float dt)
        update updated the current state of the level menu controls the robots movement if a choice has been made switches game state if the robot reached the end of the screen
        Specified by:
        update in class GameState
        Parameters:
        dt - the time since the last update

      • render

        public void render()
        Render renders all the images, buttons and the robot in the screen For now, as only 10 levels are allowed, the last 10 are always lockers
        Specified by:
        render in class GameState

      • renderSoundRelatedButtons

        private void renderSoundRelatedButtons()
        Render renders all sound related buttons considering the sound state.
